description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT... (contains full details of contract)
full_summary:
## Notice of Request for Proposal (RFP) for Regulator, Voltage

### RFP Details
| Reference Number | Solicitation Number | Publication Date | Tender Closing Date |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| PW-22-01015578 | W8485-237369/B | 2022-12-05 | 2023-01-05T14:00:00 |

### RFP Summary
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of Regulator, Voltage (Item 1) as specified below.

#### Description
* Item 1: Regulator, Voltage (GSIN: N6110)
* Quantity: 10
* Unit of Issue: EA
* Delivery Location: Canadian Forces Support Establishment (CFSE) Montreal, Canada
* Delivery Date: January 30th, 2023

#### Notice
Bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service to ensure timely and secure bid delivery, due to reduced business hours and limited staff availability at the specified bid receiving Unit.

#### Submission Requirements
* Proposals must be submitted in English or French.
* Equivalent or Substitute Product proposals must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information
#### Procurement Authority
* Department of National Defence
* 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Contact Person
* Danny Lebel
* Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: [Not Available]
* Fax: [Not Available]

### Additional Information
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be downloaded from the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) website.

### Annexes
The RFP documents, including the Bid Solicitation document, may be downloaded from the links provided below:
* Bid Solicitation Document (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/bfd2d3a7d1b18098faad24cd0ca92984/w8485-237369b_bid_solicitation_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/bfd2d3a7d1b18098faad24cd0ca92984/w8485-237
